title: Roquefort salad with pears, chicory and walnut oil
description: Simon Hopkinson's simple salad combines creamy roquefort with crisp, bitter leaves.

default: 2-3 heads red and white chicory, separated into leaves, soaked in iced water for about 10 minutes
1 large ripe pear, peeled, thinly sliced

steps: Dry the chicory leaves and neatly arrange onto a serving dish, inner curved sides facing upwards. Drape the pear slices over the leaves.
Evenly distribute the cheese in and amongst the leaves and squeeze over a touch of lemon juice.
Trickle over the walnut oil and grind over a little freshly ground black pepper.
